reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup**: Geekvape Ammit 26ga ni80 @.54 ohms

**Percentage**: 1%

**Steeped**: SnV and 7 days

Very full feeling from this. Nothing juicy at all, almost dry but not in a harsh way. Has a slight strawberry feel with hints of very very light vanilla. 

I love cotton candy and most cotton candy flavours I've tried have mostly been just dull and boring. Or rather be used as emulsifiers than a flavour in a recipe. 

This one is rather interesting and fun instead. It's very pleasant. It doesn't make me super thirsty nor does it make me experience olfactory fatigue in 10 drags. 

I do find all of the cotton candy variants behave differently after steeping with other flavours in them so also mixed it with VTA's Forest Mixed Berries @ 2%. Very yummy. Like mixed berry cotton candy. Delicious.

**Verdict**: Delicious. Grab it if you enjoy cotton candy. It's not that emulsifying an emulsifier, but rather a good thing to mix it with. 

Complimentary recipe:

2% VTA Forest Mixed Berries

1% VTA Fairy Floss
reviewsJson.author: RoninVX
reviewsJson.title: Fairy Floss
